summary: An ordinance granting to the Chicago, Milwaukee & St. Paul Railway Company, a corporation, its successors and assigns, the right, privilege and authority to locate, lay down, construct, maintain and operate, for the term herein mentioned, certain railway tracks in, along, upon and and across certain designated streets, avenues, alleys and public places within the limits of said city, and granting said corporation rights of way for such tracks in, along, upon and across said streets, avenues, alleys and other public places in said city.
